name: retroluxearchive
description: This site has 2 apps and a API.

scripts.client: cd client frontend/ && npm run start
scripts.buildClient: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd client frontend/ && npm run build && npm i
scripts.buildAPI: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.buildDash: cd dashboard && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm install && cd dash && npm install && npm run build
